00001 #include <stdio.h>
00002 #include "QuEST.h"
00003 
00004 int main (int narg, char *varg[]) {
00005 
00006     /*
00007      * PREPARE QuEST environment
00008      * (Required only once per program)
00009      */
00010 
00011     QuESTEnv env;
00012     initQuESTEnv(&env);
00013 
00014     printf("-------------------------------------------------------\n");
00015     printf("Running QuEST tutorial:\n\t Basic circuit involving a system of 3 qubits.\n");
00016     printf("-------------------------------------------------------\n");
00017 
00018     /*
00019      * PREPARE QUBIT SYSTEM
00020      */
00021 
00022     MultiQubit qubits; 
00023     createMultiQubit(&qubits, 3, env);
00024     initStateZero(&qubits);
00025 
00026 
00027     /*
00028      * REPORT SYSTEM AND ENVIRONMENT
00029      */
00030     printf("\nThis is our environment:\n");
00031     reportMultiQubitParams(qubits);
00032     reportQuESTEnv(env);
00033 
00034     /*
00035      * APPLY CIRCUIT
00036      */
00037 
00038     hadamard(qubits, 0);
00039     controlledNot(qubits, 0, 1);
00040     rotateY(qubits, 2, .1);
00041 
00042     multiControlledPhaseGate(qubits, (int []){0, 1, 2}, 3);
00043 
00044     ComplexMatrix2 u;
00045     u.r0c0 = (Complex) {.real=.5, .imag= .5};
00046     u.r0c1 = (Complex) {.real=.5, .imag=-.5}; 
00047     u.r1c0 = (Complex) {.real=.5, .imag=-.5};
00048     u.r1c1 = (Complex) {.real=.5, .imag= .5};
00049     unitary(qubits, 0, u);
00050 
00051     Complex a, b;
00052     a.real = .5; a.imag =  .5;
00053     b.real = .5; b.imag = -.5;
00054     compactUnitary(qubits, 1, a, b);
00055 
00056     Vector v;
00057     v.x = 1; v.y = 0; v.z = 0;
00058     rotateAroundAxis(qubits, 2, 3.14/2, v);
00059 
00060     controlledCompactUnitary(qubits, 0, 1, a, b);
00061 
00062     multiControlledUnitary(qubits, (int []){0, 1}, 2, 2, u);
00063 
00064     printf("\nCircuit output:\n");
00065 
00066     REAL prob = getProbEl(qubits, 7);
00067     printf("Probability amplitude of |111>: %f\n", prob);
00068 
00069     prob = findProbabilityOfOutcome(qubits, 2, 1);
00070     printf("Probability of qubit 2 being in state 1: %f\n", prob);
00071 
00072     int outcome = measure(qubits, 0);
00073     printf("Qubit 0 was measured in state %d\n", outcome);
00074 
00075     outcome = measureWithStats(qubits, 2, &prob);
00076     printf("Qubit 2 collapsed to %d with probability %f\n", outcome, prob);
00077 
00078 
00079     /*
00080      * FREE MEMORY
00081      */
00082 
00083     destroyMultiQubit(qubits, env); 
00084 
00085 
00086     /*
00087      * CLOSE QUEST ENVIRONMET
00088      * (Required once at end of program)
00089      */
00090     closeQuESTEnv(env);
00091     return 0;
00092 }
